title: Open web sites close automatically
content: If I have a web site open, if I minimize it to look at a different site, the fist is automatically closed. What in the h**l can I do? I know, it's just Mozilla.

title: Como ativar a "home page" no Firefox?
content: Procurei várias dicas no Google,mas, não consegui ativar. Mencionam dados que não encontro na relação que abre quando clico nas 3 linhas na parte supérior a direita da tela. Como devo proceder para fixar a opção home page na tela inicial do Firefox?
creator: axxrau

title: Hirefox and facebook messenger
content:
Have Firefox 131. When in FB messenger, when I share a post, the person I send it to gets a pic of the person who initially posted the link. When I click on the picture, it then shows the link I sent. This does not happen in Chrome, or on my Android phone. It only started when I upgraded from 90 something to 131. What gives?

Garry Schaffer
creator: Garrysch
